content.query:
IF EXISTS ( SELECT * FROM sys.external_tables WHERE object_id = OBJECT_ID('dbo.D_STLMSDeliveryPickupCustomer') )
    DROP EXTERNAL TABLE dbo.D_STLMSDeliveryPickupCustomer
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE dbo.D_STLMSDeliveryPickupCustomer (
    [lms_customer_id] int,
    [lms_customer_activeflag] int,
    [lms_customer_adres1] nvarchar(4000),
    [lms_customer_adres2] nvarchar(4000),

    [lms_customer_faxno] nvarchar(4000),
    [lms_customer_fctype] int,
    [lms_customer_flevy] numeric(18,2),

    [lms_customer_telno] nvarchar(4000),
    [lms_customer_town] nvarchar(4000),
    [lms_customer_volfact] numeric(18,2),
    [lms_customer_wtype] int,
    [orv_customer_id] bigint,
    [orv_customer_name] nvarchar(4000),
    [orv_customer_contact] nvarchar(4000),
    [orv_customer_email] nvarchar(4000),

    [orv_customer_cref] int,

	WITH (
	LOCATION = 'Structured Data/OPS/stdeliverypickupcustomer.parquet',
	DATA_SOURCE = [synapse_citylogisticsstorage_dfs_core_windows_net],
	FILE_FORMAT = [SynapseParquetFormat]
	)
GO


SELECT TOP 100 * FROM dbo.D_STLMSDeliveryPickupCustomer 
GO
